channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Gmail Feature Poses Security Risk For 2.5 Billion Android, iPhone Users
item.description: Google has launched a brand new Gmail feature today, but just how safe will you be using the new “happening now” summary cards for Android and iOS use...

item.title: The opposite of ‘perfect’
item.description: It’s not junk. No, the opposite of perfect is: Meets spec Useful On time Productive Valuable By definition, good enough is good enough. If the spec is...

item.title: iOS 18.0.1 Release Date: Unexpected iPhone Update Nearly Here, Report Says
item.description: Until last week, many had assumed that the next iPhone update would be iOS 18.1. Now, a new report says something else is coming first.

item.title: The paradox of brittle

item.title: Government Experts Say Complicated Passwords Are Making You Less Safe
item.description: Government experts are now recommending longer but easier to remember passcodes over complex ones using symbols and mixed capitals..

item.title: Is Quantum Computing An Unlikely Answer To AI’s Looming Energy Crisis?

item.title: ‘Bad Monkey’ Is The Surprise Hit TV Show Of 2024 And One Of The Best
item.description: One of the best TV shows of 2024 and Vince Vaughn's best role ever.
